alert.note: Alert for Nolan; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Nolan and western Taylor Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 712 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over View, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nolan, Tye, Buffalo Gap, Hylton, Maryneal, View, Happy Valley, Coronados Camp, Caps, Dyess Afb, Lake Abilene, Camp Tonkawa, Shep, Lake Sweetwater, Camp Butman, Camp Boothe Oaks and The Intersection Of Highway 70 And Ranch Road 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
